item.title: DriftGuard: A Hierarchical Framework for Concept Drift Detection and Remediation in Supply Chain Forecasting
item.description: arXiv:2601.08928v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Supply chain forecasting models degrade over time as real-world conditions change. Promotions shift, consumer preferences evolve, and supply disruptions alter demand patterns, causing what is known as concept drift.
